Package edu.citadel.cprl.ast

Class IfStmt

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.citadel.cprl.ast.AST
      • edu.citadel.cprl.ast.Statement
        • edu.citadel.cprl.ast.IfStmt
  • public class IfStmt
extends Statement
    The abstract syntax tree node for an if statement.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      IfStmt​(Expression booleanExpr, java.util.List<Statement> thenStmts)
      Construct an if statement with the specified boolean expression and list of "then" statements.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IfStmt

        public IfStmt​(Expression booleanExpr,
              java.util.List<Statement> thenStmts)
        Construct an if statement with the specified boolean expression and list of "then" statements.
        Parameters:
        booleanExpr - the boolean expression that, if true, will result in the execution of the list of "then" statements.
        thenStmts - the statements to be executed when the boolean expression evaluates to true.

    • Method Detail

      • getThenStmts

        public java.util.List<Statement> getThenStmts()
        Returns the list of "then" statements for this if statement.

      • addElsifPart

        public void addElsifPart​(ElsifPart elsifPart)
        Add an ElsifPart to this if statement.
        Parameters:
        elsifPart - the ElsifPart to be added

      • getElsifParts

        public java.util.List<ElsifPart> getElsifParts()
        Returns the list of elsif parts for this if statement.

      • addElseStmts

        public void addElseStmts​(java.util.List<Statement> elseStmts)
        Add a list of "else" statements to this if statement. These are the statements that get executed if boolean expressions associated with the if statement and all elsif parts evaluate to false.
        Parameters:
        elseStmts - the list of else statements for this if statement.

      • getElseStmts

        public java.util.List<Statement> getElseStmts()
        Returns the list of "else" statements for this if statement.
